title: Angelina Jolie reveals why she 'will never wed again'
text:
Angelina Jolie reveals why she 'will never wed again'

Cape Town - Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt were together for 12 years before she filed for divorce.

An insider recently revealed that the mother of six felt pressured by Brad into getting married nine years into their relationship, Daily Mail reported.

Angelina is enjoying being on her own and doesn’t want to walk down the aisle anytime soon, especially after the pain of another divorce, a source close to the Maleficent actress told US Weekly recently.

This comes after the 44-year-old got candid about "not feeling strong" over the past few years amid her difficult divorce proceedings.

Although the pair are legally single, they haven’t yet finalised their divorce.

Brad and Angelina share kids Maddox (18), Pax (15), Zahara (14), Shiloh (13) and twins Knox and Vivienne (11).

Their oldest son Maddox revealed that his relationship with the Once Upon a Time in Hollywood actor is strained.

The 18-year-old was asked by paparazzi whether Brad would be visiting at college.

"I don’t know about that, what’s happening," Maddox replied.

When asked by a journalist whether he’s relationship with his father was tarnished for good, he responded, "Whatever happens, happens."

(Sources: US Weekly, Daily Mail)
